channel.title: Leveling source ?!
channel.description: hi all !!! i have a question... and i need help lol ... 3 month im searching for a nice source.. but i dont have what i want .. i want a leveling server ... not exp VERY fast.. and i know a little bit how to code but when i create exemple a shop and i compile when i try to log in its not working.. so please if you have a VERY nice source , please help :(

item.title: Leveling source ?!
item.dc:creator: @The_Chubby_Bunny The Chubby Bunny
item.description:
@The_Chubby_Bunny wrote:

If your server gives combat xp based on objects, your going to need to retrieve the objectid’s from each object, and then find the case for each.
To find them just search:

case [OBJECTID]:

Don’t delete the whole case, it will make things more complicated.
You should see:

case [OBJECTID]:
addSkillXP(####,#);
sendMessage("you hit a door, or some other gay ass shit like that");
break;

Just delete everything between case and break;.
If you delete the “break;” without deleting “case:” or vis versa, you’ll get errors.
Before careful, there are very few sources that won’t PMS if you screw up. And there’s no Midol for that shit.

Read full topic
